availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Isaac D. Hopewell (Bath County, Kentucky, laborer and pauper )

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, laborer and pauper. Virginia native. Married to Charlotte Magowan Hopewell in Bath County, Kentucky, on April 4, 1849. Father of Isaac Newton Hopewell and Eliza F. Hopewell. Laborer in Bath County, Kentucky, in 1850. Pauper in Mason County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, City/District 2, p. 52A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 2, p. 27.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Owingsville, p. 67B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bath County Marriages, Film 000273005.
